text.more: The network includes 50,000 followers of 5 twitter media accounts: N1, RTS, Danas, Kurir and Informer, 10, 000 for each. Nodes are colored based on the number of media accounts that they are following: 1-green (69.57%), 2-purple (23.9%), 3-yellow (4.71%), 4-orange (1.35%), 5- light red (0.43%). The vast majority of users in the sample follows only one account. Of those 23.93 % following two accounts, the majority follows N1 and Danas (8.9%) and Informer and Kurir (7.3%). These results suggest a clear polarization of tweeter users with regards to their news consumption habits on Twitter.
text.title: Network of followers of selected Serbian media
